content: floof is an ultra cozy non itchy neck wrap that is first knit straight and then in the round it is designed for faux fur yarn the split collar keeps the back of your neck warm and looks great over your coat and the cowl section can be worn under or outside your coat super fast knit makes an affordable practical and fluffy gift the faux fur yarn is extremely forgiving and produces a great product for beginning and experienced knitters alike three sizes so you can get the coverage you like size cowl neck 24 body 32 total length front length point to collar split 8 big cowl neck 28 body 44 total length front length point to collar split 9 capelet neck 30 body 46 total length front length point to collar split 12 gauge with this yarn is very hard to measure and is not all that important for the end product gauge obtained for the cowl sample was about 2 5 st per inch don t worry about the row gauge needle sz 11 8 0 mm circular knitting needle - 24 60 cm stitch markers - 3 stitch markers are used one should be unique to designate beginning of round materials 90 140 190 yards super bulky faux fur yarn
